name: Escape the dark (Neef_Gears)
description:
This is the story of a young warrior named Lilly. Everything start in an underground caverns - no clues how she got there. Find the way out and be careful. Everything that moves is an enemy!!! 

Currently there are six levels and three types of enemies.

Hope you enjoy. Please email or comment your impressions and ideas.

Main charecter provided by PushplayArt.

Skeleton enemy by LuizMelo.

Levels 1 and 2 background by Szadi art.

Main menu and levels 3, 4 background by MadFireOn.

Levels 5 and 6 background by Pathway.

Coins made by Lexassets.

Tiles made by pzUH.

Linux and Windows versions.
